sourcesContent:
import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl";
import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel";
import Input from "@mui/material/Input";
import { ThemeProvider, createTheme } from "@mui/material/styles";
import { MuiThemeMod } from "../../css/muiTheme";
import Grid from '@mui/material/Grid';
import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper';
import Textarea from '@mui/base/TextareaAutosize';


function ProjectForm() {
  const theme = createTheme(MuiThemeMod);

  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={theme}>
    <Grid
      container
      spacing={3}
      justifyContent="center"
      alignItems="center"
      marginTop={2}
      >
      <Grid item xs={8} md={8} lg={10}>
        <Paper>
          <FormControl fullWidth>
            <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Project name:</InputLabel>
            <Input id="email" name="email" type="text" aria-describedby="my-helper-text"/>
          </FormControl>
        </Paper>
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={8} md={8} lg={10}>
        <Paper>
          <FormControl fullWidth>
            <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Email address:</InputLabel>
            <Input 
            id="email" 
            name="email" 
            type="text" 
            aria-describedby="my-helper-text" placeholder="@.com" />
          </FormControl>
        </Paper>
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={8} md={8} lg={5}>
        <Paper>
          <FormControl fullWidth>
            <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Your phone:</InputLabel>
              <Input 
                id="phone" 
                name="phone" 
                type="text" 
                aria-describedby="my-helper-text" 
              />
          </FormControl>
        </Paper>
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={8} md={8} lg={5}>
        <Paper>
          <FormControl fullWidth>
            <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Project budget:</InputLabel>
              <Input 
                id="budget" 
                name="budget" 
                type="number" 
                aria-describedby="my-helper-text" 
              />
          </FormControl>
        </Paper>
      </Grid>
      <Grid item xs={8} md={8} lg={10}>
        <Paper>
          <FormControl fullWidth>
            <InputLabel htmlFor="my-input">Project description:</InputLabel>
              <Input 
                id="description" 
                name="description" type="description"
                minRows={5}
                aria-describedby="my-helper-text" 
              />
          </FormControl>
        </Paper>
      </Grid>
    </Grid>
  </ThemeProvider>
  );
}

export default ProjectForm;
